Tequila 60 ml.
Cointreau 30 ml.
30 ml Lemon juice.
Ice.
Salt for the rim of the glass.

Take the glass and rub the edge with the 3/4 lemon juice, immediately after passing the edges of the salt. Place all ingredients (except salt) in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and serve the drink (which should be salted on its edge) Garnish with a slice of lemon on the rim
